snippet: On Friday night, Jamaica's Reggae Boyz landed a haymaker square on the jaw of Jurgen Klinsmann and the United States national team in a World Cup qualifier. On Tuesday, the Americans will try to answer it with one of their own.
abstract: On Friday night, Jamaica's Reggae Boyz landed a haymaker square on the jaw of Jurgen Klinsmann and the United States national team in a World Cup qualifier. On Tuesday, the Americans will try to answer it with one of their own.

headline.main: Bloodied but Unbowed, U.S. Prepares for Round 2 Against Jamaica
